LanguageData.ImmunoBlockerslow.label: Immunoblockers
LanguageData.ImmunoBlockerslow.description: Allows for a slight reduction in organ rejection and cyberpsychosis.
LanguageData.ImmunoBlockersStrong.label: Strong immunoblockers
LanguageData.ImmunoBlockersStrong.description: Significantly reduces the effects of cyberpsychosis on the body
